name: Prison, Zombies and Chicken
description:
Small game, with only 2 levels for now, made in Unity for the Game Dev Network: Cherry Game Jam, the theme for the jam was dungeons. You are a prisoner who one day finds his cell open and when he comes out finds out that everybody has become a zombie trying to kill him now his only choice is to find a weapon, eat chicken and escape from the prison.

This game was develop by:

Programmers:

-Liormax

-Ilikeoreos

3D Artist:

-Stevo

Music:

-Cirno
